title: WÜSTHOF's NEW Nakiri
transcripts: One of the most popular asian-style blades we offer is the nakiri wusthof has now added two new Nukiri's to the collection we have a classic 5-inch nakiri and one of my personal favorites classic ikon 7-inch nakiri now the 7-inch nakiri is one of my personal favorites because the rounded tip allows you to use a rock chop with it it has a hollow edge on it allowing food to fall off the blade a little easier and it's got an ergonomic handle with double bolsters it feels really balanced in your hand the nakiri is super-sharp allowing you to slice dice and chop just about any ingredient now there's three different ways you can use the nakiri for leafy vegetables like this i'm just going to split it down I'd be using this for like stir-fries we can use a rock chop just straightforward and down for your traditional style of using a knife the second way to use the knife is the push cut method but we're just going forward and down this method is particularly useful in cutting things like celery and the third cutting method is the flat chop method for getting very fine cuts. The classic 5-inch nakiri and the 7-inch classic iconic nakiri one of my personal favorites.
